title: Lee Sin Art
body:
Here is my 2nd drawing I did{{champion:64}} :

http://imgur.com/YP5Iu3M

This time I took about a day to draw. 
Here is my 1st one i drew{{champion:238}} :

http://imgur.com/nFaJFYa

You can definitely see improvment and hopefully I get better and better.
Comment any questions, tips, what you think about my drawings or your favourite champion and It might just be my next champion I draw.

replies.body:
Very impressive artworks you have there friend! keep up the excellent work.
{{champion:64}} {{champion:238}}
Rumble x Tristy, always  commenting on my post :)) you must be my first fan.
Well done! I like this one a big better cos shading and variation in line shape and size.
